Description: Shell of a marine gastropod mollusc of the Conomurex fasciatus species.
Curator's comments: Found in box of unregistered shells with other shells that had handwritten slips written by Petrie identifying the shell species and naming Naukratis as the provenance. This shell was found with a note by Petrie: 'Strombus fasciatus Red Sea Nebireh (Naucratis) 1885'. Now known as Conomurex fasciatus (WoRMS), which confirms a Red Sea distribution.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (WC.09)
